transcript:
Customer: to me kya dhyan karu.

[inaudible]

Customer: Hello.
Executive: ji bolo.
Customer: Hello.
Executive: ji bhai.
Customer: Hello.
Executive: ji sir.
Customer: ha india mart se sir baat kar raha tha wo call nahi kiya aapne net chal raha hai kar payenge us par discussion ya fir abhi nahi ho payega.
Customer: abhi main area me hu aap bej dijiye main karta hu aap bataye na.
Executive: wo chalega net.
Customer: ha ha chalega chalega mobile pe hu.
Executive: theek hai theek hai.
Executive: mobile pe ho ek baar dekho na india mart open karke chal raha hai kya.
Customer: kiya kiya open hai.
Executive: open hai theek hai do teen cheeze important thi kyuki wo yaha se pure account ko audit karunga tabhi wo aage jayega na.
Customer: ji ji.
Executive: to kuch aapke account me na aisi categories added hai jin categories ka aapne buylead to consume kiya hai but wo category kisi bhi product me add nahi hai.
Customer: okay.
Executive: usi category ke basis pe hi aapko lead ya direct inquiry dikhti hai jaise sports equipment ek category hai.
Customer: ha ha.
Executive: to sports equipment me aap deal karte ho kyuki usme to har tarah ka sports equipment aa jayega.
Customer: ha usme sab type ke sport aate hai cricket stamp bats wagera.
Executive: ha to usme har tarah ke deal karte hai na.
Customer: ji ji karte hai hum.
Executive: theek hai ek aapka sports wear ho gaya sports wear me to har tarah ke sports wear aa jayega.
Customer: ha ha lower t-shirts wagera sab ha theek hai baki to aur koi ha ek bhi hai.
Executive: ha pvc cricket ball.
Customer: ha cricket ball me jyadatar deal hai.
Executive: kids track suit.
Customer: ha track suit.
Executive: usme bhi kids walo me.
Customer: ji kya bole sir.
Executive: kids walo me kids me.
Customer: kids walo.
Executive: wait kids track suit.
Customer: ha track suit hai.
Executive: ha to ye category fir main jo add nahi hai ye jitni bhi maine padh ke batai ye add nahi hai to inko main add kar raha hu theek hai.
Customer: ji ji.
Executive: uske baad aapka jo account ka score hai wo ek reason hai jiski kyuki do hi aapne reason issue bataya tha uske majorly do hi solution hai pehla ki aap jaise bulk me deal kar rahe ho theek hai aapko fake buylead ka issue aa raha hai to usme ek hi option hai ki jo bhi buyer ne apni requirement dali hai kyuki hamare paas buyer automatically apni requirement fill karta hai ab usme 90% chances yaha ye jarur ho sakte hai ki bhai usne quantity me hazar likh diya ho but usko ek piece chahiye ho to ho sakta hai wo hazar price likhna chah raha ho.
Executive: to wo hum kaise identify karenge wo aap buyer ki detail padh ke identify karoge ki buyer ka usme GST hai ki nahi hai man lo agar GST nahi hai aur waha quantity hazar piece dala hua hai ya fir mobile number email id hai but company name company address wala option nahi hai kuch bhi aur waha hazar piece likha hua hai to there is an high chance ki wo retail ho sakta hai kyuki jo bhi hazar piece ki requirement lega wo end buyer nahi hoga to ye thoda sa na check karke hi leads consume karni padegi problem hai ki buyer initially to dal deta hai but wo to aap jab buylead consume karte ho tab aapko pata lagta hai to us tarah ki buylead waste na ho to initially aap isko aise check kariyega please aur uske baad aap thoda time jab aise use karoge check karke ki bhai hazar piece ki quantity hai GST likha hua hai aur call kiya aur tab bhi agar wo one piece bol raha hai to ek baar jarur dobara se batana pehla theek hai.
Customer: ji ji.
Executive: second abhi jo aapne buylead consume kari hai recently ha inka kya feedback hoga inse kuch baat hoti hai.
Customer: actually sir by lead by lead already se baat hui thi jaise barik naam ka jo customer hai jaise ek to ye trika t-shirt ka tha aapne kal parso kari thi trika t-shirt ki naika t-shirt type ka allahabad ki ek aapka sports april ki buylead hai sangli ki jo aapne consume kari ek sports equipment ki aapne kari vadodara check karo ek baar iska bataunga ha sir just like quotation tender liya tha unhone ha to tender ke liye pricing list mangi thi unhone okay initially quotation wagera mangi hai.
Customer: ji ji quotation type.
Executive: theek hai to matlab inse fir dobara se koi follow up ya dobara baat ya abhi hoga.
Customer: dobara matlab sir just like one to three days baad aap feedback lena padega unka kyuki tender to actually me i think agle mahine me unka ha samajh gaya ji ji samajh gaya kuch buyer ki call jo hamare paas directly aati hai ye call bhi miss ho jati hai to ye miss kaise hoti hai matlab pata nahi lagta aapko ya fir kaise hota hai ye.
Customer: actually sir kaisi hai after the 6 pm main chala jata hu office se to jo bhi call aati hai wo directly sir ke mobile pe aati hai sir pick up kar lete hai.
Executive: ji ji ha matlab wo usi me miss ho raha hoga majorly na.
Customer: ji ji.
Executive: kyuki main jaise call miss ka dekh raha hu na jo miss calls hoti hai majorly to wo miss call ka jo time hai wo jaise november me jo miss call hai 4 to 8 pm ke beech me hai to ha wo 6 pm aa gaya hoga but beech me bhi hoti hai sir wo miss 12 se char 9 se 12 me bhi.
Customer: sir actually sir call aate honge to actually factory me kaise hai hamara work rehta hai aur jaise ki hamara matlab customer bhi kaise aate rehte hai to unke sath meeting me rehte hai jyadatar to us type to sare product ke liye wholesale business hai sara.
Customer: ji ji wholesale hai.
Executive: sare products pe jitne bhi add kare hue hai.
Customer: ji ji aur brand bhi hai na sir bond sport ka hamara ha acha apna brand hai to hum log apne brand ki hi marketing wagera apne brand se bechte hai sara nahi sir just like a dealership bhi hai koi customer ko agar chahiye jaise ki nivea ka koi product chahiye usko agar usne suppose india mart pe inquiry dali football chahiye aur usne bola ki mujhe nahi nivea ka chahiye to just like dealership ke type me hum usko kara dete hai MRP pe 30 to 40% off me provide karke uske sath deal karte hai hum samajh gaya ji ji.
Executive: kuch ye bata diya theek hai ab isme na ek cheez bas ye rahegi jo aapne mujhe bataya uske liye main kya kar raha hu main aapke owner aapka aur apna aur aapke account manager ka hum charo ka ek whatsapp common group create kar raha hu theek hai kyuki usse kyuki initially sir ka kya tha na complaint yahi tha ki bhai wo dalte to hazar hai but wo nikalta ek hi pair hai to wo na ek group create kar raha hu to aisa kuch bhi agar aaye buylead ye aapne mujhe turant aapko na group me na wo buylead ka screenshot bej dena jaise hi aata hai to that's why main usko turant check karwaunga kyuki wo track hoga check hoga tabhi us pe kuch na kuch action hum aage le payenge.
Customer: ji ji sir wo to best on best rahega suppose sir individually just suppose main customer hu maine india mart pe search kiya just like aapka option likh ke aata hai kya matlab kitni quantity chahiye maine kabhi use to nahi kiya bolna aise puch raha hu bas jab aap india mart pe search karte ho ji suppose one customer is aa gaya india mart pe usne just like suppose search ki kashmiri wala bat to aap likh ke aata hai quantity kitni chahiye ya fir pricing aap jaise jaise man lo main maine school shoe supplier google pe search kiya mere samne india mart ka link aa gaya theek hai maine india mart ke link pe click kiya to india mart ke link pe mere samne wo sare supplier aa gaye jo noida ya noida me deal karte hai jaise main noida baitha hu to mera google ko location access hai theek hai ab main upar se niche jab scroll kar raha honga to mere samne na pop up aata hai ki what are you looking for kindly help to usme mera mobile number mangega main jab mobile number enter karunga aur requirement submit karunga to uske baad fir waha pe ek option aa jata hai ki tell us the quantity aur us quantity se order value add hoti hai jaise kitne order value ka jaise man lo hazar hazar pair hai to kitna order value hai to hamare har ek product ke kuch kuch already units pehle se predefined hai jaise school shoes me jyadatar log pair me likhte hai to how many pair needed how many pieces ki jagah wo pair hoga word ya kuch product aise hai jo kg me aate honge to wo kg me hota hoga update ji ji okay ji me update hota hoga ji ji kya keh rahe hai ji sir samajh gaya to wo waha par na buyer ke paas pop up aata hai jab wo requirement fill karta hai is cheez pe okay okay theek hai sir bana dijiye group me puch raha tha update kar dunga usme kya keh rahe hai aap bana liye group bana de raha hu main group aapko abhi create kar de raha hu ji ji madam ko call aap dal dijiye main directly okay okay theek hai madam ko initially group me dal do ki i want to connect pichle bar ki baat kar raha hu mujhe kuch problem aayi to pehle madam ko hi call karta tha kuch issue aaye to koi madam ji kar sakte ho ya mujhe kar mujhe kar do madam ko kar lo but initially call karne se pehle group isliye create kiya hua hai karunga agar kuch bhi aisa hai na to group pe dal do na ki mam please connect me asap aisa kuch bhi dal do group me ya kuch bhi group banai is vajah se rahe na taki wo connectivity frequently bani rahe okay okay theek hai theek hai iska na ek feedback wapis se jayega kyuki ye main jo sir ne feedback diya tha usko close karunga to usko na ek baar sir ko aap update kar dena group ke bare me okay okay theek hai okay okay theek hai sir ji ji theek hai thank you sir.
summary:
Concerns:

- Facing issues with fake buyleads.

- Missed calls after 6 PM.

- Categories with consumed buyleads not added to products.



Resolution:

- Executive is adding missing categories to account.

- Executive will create a WhatsApp group for communication.

- Explained how to identify potential retail buyers.



Next Steps: 

- Executive to create WhatsApp group.

- Customer to update executive about one piece orders.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, subscription, account score, categories, whatsapp group
